hero.bannerText1:

hero.bannerText2: Pay salaries via Privat24 for Business without fee for salary project cash settlement transactions.
hero.bannerText4: Additional funds for purchasing energy generation systems.
hero.bannerTitle5: Support the Ukrainian army in any part of the world!

hero.bannerText6:
Free and safe cloud keys for digital signing.
Sign electronic documents instantly without flash drives and plugins!
hero.bannerText7: Will remind you about deadlines пfor submitting reports to the taxoffice or statistics service.
hero.newsText: Nothing is broken — we’re just improving our services. Therefore, during the period 03.07.2025 22:00 – 04.07.2025 01:00, there may be some temporary difficulties in the operation of Privat24 for Business, specifically with the generation and signing using QES/EDS keys.
hero.logIES: log in with the file IES
hero.codeText: Scan the QR-code via an application <<Privat24>> or <<Privat24 forbusiness>>
